concept.title: Expression Language
concept.shortdesc: The StreamSets expression language enables you to create expressions that evaluate or modify data. The expression language is based on the JSP 2.0 Expression Language.

conbody.p: Data Collectorexpression languageexpression languageoverviewUse the expression language to create expressions in the Expression Evaluator and conditions in the Stream Selector processor. You can also use the expression language when you configure data rules, the Hadoop FS output file options, and Kafka Producer partition strategy.

You can use the following elements in an expression or condition:
Field names
Constants
Literals
Operators
Functions
